department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: brown leather cover with dark brown/ black linear design contains loose pages with Arabic text in red, gold and black; some pages contain images of prayer rugs in colored pigments; edges of pages/ text block have been colored with blue pigment; triangular flap and leather strap secure manuscript when closed; 271 pages total
dimension:
6 11/16 × 5 7/8 × 2 1/4 in. (16.99 × 14.92 × 5.72 cm) (with cover closed)
37 1/8 in. (94.3 cm) (object part, strap)
title: Islamic manuscript
